summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 GMC SIERRA 1500. THE CONTACT STATED THAT, OVER TIME, THE DASHBOARD BEGAN TO CRACK IN VARIOUS PLACES, BEGINNING ON THE UPPER DRIVER SIDE CORNER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO A DEALER OR INDEPENDENT MECHANIC. A DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND STATED THAT THEY WOULD NOT REPLACE THE DASHBOARD AS THERE WAS NO RECALL, BUT COULD POTENTIALLY PROVIDE SOME FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 85,000.
